author: 2Face Idibia
title: Ocho
text: Ja ka no h'ayi kpoma eee
Ocho ya nno ma ye o o
Eko du ne bane, ebane konechi ti ne tatache
Acho h'iba ne, ebane wa ga yufi unwalu noo
Ochedu labobotu ka anu bobi fie noo
Okpa nna je eya, a'je fi'Owoicho gla noo
Odo bobi du nna ya, e je ka'Owoicho e'mo, e'to taje lo' oo
Odo lohi du na ya, e ja ka'Owoicho g'emo, e'mo e'totajelo' oo
Ocho aleki ya fiya manoo, eko maladun tete a eheheh
Ja ka no h'ayi kpoma eee
Ocho ya nno ma ye o o
When I rise every morning I thank God for another day, I beg
Him to keep the blessing coming and find my feet around
Eko du na m'ol idango na ge ya bei'nka jen'ma u go de want
Kalo lojilima chia lo, kalo lojilima chowoicho kole to kalo
Kalo ojilima chOwoicho, kole' lonogu kan'oloko lofu kan'no
Ocho idango fi ya man oo;
Ja ka no h'ayi kpoma eee
Ocho ya nno ma ye o
